title: Que dodge times
body: Yesterday i was playing and during champ select my pc crashed for unknown reasons. i get back on and i have a dodge wait of 15 minutes. i do not normally dodge so this was troublesome for me. fortunately it was just an aram game so no loss but if it were a ranked game and i was in promotionals that would be counted as a loss. is there any type of code that could recognize when a game is not dodged due to reasons out of our control?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, there is no sure fire or 100% accurate way to detect this.  Is there is a difference between a power outage and someone unplugging their computer?  What about a loss of internet vs turning off your router?  The end affects are exactly the same, but there is no way to verify and prove what caused it.  Because of this, we have structured our penalties in a way that scale in harshness with consistency.  We know that frankly, shit happens, and try to accommodate for this.  However, if it happens more and more, the penalties get steeper.

I hope this helps relieve some confusion.  Let me know if you have any other questions!
